tool_description: Manages mapping of temperature sensors to specific food service equipment and monitoring zones for organized tracking.

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for food service equipment

equipment_type.description: Equipment category: walk_in_cooler, reach_in_freezer, prep_table, hot_holding_unit, display_case

sensor_assignments.description: Array of sensor IDs assigned to this equipment

error_messages: Invalid equipment_id: Equipment identifier must be non-empty alphanumeric string.
Invalid equipment_type: Must be one of [walk_in_cooler, reach_in_freezer, prep_table, hot_holding_unit, display_case].
Empty sensor_assignments: Must assign at least one sensor to equipment.
Invalid location_description: Location description cannot be empty.
Sensor assignment conflict: One or more sensors are already assigned to different equipment.
usage: Provide equipment_id, equipment_type, sensor_assignments array, and location_description to create equipment-sensor mapping for organized monitoring.

mapping_id.description: Unique identifier for this equipment mapping

sensors_mapped.description: Number of sensors successfully assigned to equipment

mapping_status.description: Result of mapping operation: completed, partial, failed
